title: Judges could rule on Snap food aid as top Trump official rejects call to use emergency funding to keep benefits going – live
summary: Over 40 million Americans may lose their food stamp benefits starting Saturday, as the agriculture secretary stated that finding alternative funding is legally unfeasible. This potential cutoff could significantly impact low-income households relying on these benefits for essential nutrition. The announcement raises concerns about food insecurity across the nation.
